Please refer to the CEN website: www.cen-neurologie.fr where videos are available.

question.title: What is peripheral facial paralysis (PFP)?
question.description: A condition affecting the facial nerve

option_a.title: A condition affecting the trigeminal nerve
option_a.description: A condition affecting the facial nerve

option_b.title: A condition affecting the optic nerve
option_b.description: A condition affecting the facial nerve

option_c.title: A condition affecting the facial nerve
option_c.description: A condition affecting the facial nerve

option_d.title: A condition affecting the vagus nerve
option_d.description: A condition affecting the facial nerve

correct_option.title: A
correct_option.description: This consists only a letter of the correct option
